text: “Ikiavɨra Itir God, ian God, me batuegh gɨvaghtɨ, ia uan navir averiabar kamaghɨn mɨkɨmam markɨ, ‘God ti en garima, e an damazimɨn bar dera, ezɨ a en arazir aghuir kam bangɨn nguazir aghuir kam isa e ganɨngi.’ Nɨghnɨzir kam a guizɨn nɨghnɨzim puvatɨ. Bar guizbangɨra, Ikiavɨra Itir God, ikɨzir kabar gumazamizibar garima, me arazir kurar avɨribagh ami, kamaghɨn amizɨ, a me batueghasava ami.
